title: Lucifer
plot: Lucifer Morningstar, bored from his sulking life in hell, comes to live in Los Angeles. While there, he helps humanity with its miseries through his experience and telepathic abilities to bring people's deepest desires and thoughts out of them. While meeting with a Detective in his nightclub (Lux), a shootout involving him and the Detective leads him to become an LAPD consultant who tries to punish people for their crimes through law and justice.
stars: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Lesley-Ann Brandt
companies: Aggressive Mediocrity, DC Entertainment, Jerry Bruckheimer Television

trailer.title: Lucifer
trailer.videoDescription: Lucifer makes a tumultuous return, Chloe rethinks romance, Ella finally finds a nice guy, and Amenadiel adjusts to the whole fatherhood thing.

similars.title: Stranger Things
similars.plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
similars.stars: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder

similars.title: Money Heist
similars.plot: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.
similars.stars: Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño

similars.title: The Witcher
similars.plot: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
similars.stars: Anna Shaffer, Henry Cavill, Freya Allan

similars.title: The Flash
similars.plot: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the next Flash, fighting crime in Central City.
similars.stars: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker

similars.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
similars.plot: Comedy series following the exploits of Det. Jake Peralta and his diverse, lovable colleagues as they police the NYPD's 99th Precinct.
similars.stars: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews

similars.title: Supernatural
similars.plot: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.
similars.stars: Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Jim Beaver

similars.title: The Blacklist
similars.plot: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.
similars.stars: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff

similars.title: Friends
similars.plot: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
similars.stars: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow

similars.title: Lucifer
similars.plot: A political Godfather dies and a lot of thieves dressed up as politicians took over the rule. Question arises regarding the successor of the God, unfolding few names, along with the God's most beloved angel, Lucifer.

similars.title: Grey's Anatomy
similars.plot: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.
similars.stars: Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr.

similars.title: The Boys
similars.plot: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
similars.stars: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr

similars.title: Game of Thrones
similars.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
similars.stars: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington
